title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and/or block printed on plain weave; glazed
description: Two pieces, same design, different colors. A) White ground with broad stripes made of pin stripes of minute bars in rose color, centre area in minute zig-zag with elongated interlace in brown; in white area, sprays of field flowers in shades of red, block-printed or surface roller. Ground probably "molette." B) Same design in blue. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and/or block printed on plain weave; glazed. 1967-10-1-a.
